Posts.Content: Hi, I'm a new member. I have been reading a few days and decided to jump in. I'm just at the begining of my cancer battle. I have stage 1 cancer ER/PR+ her-, no lymph nodes were positive. I had a lumpectomy. Today I was told that maybe I should consider Chemo and Radiation as a treatment. I thought I was on the road to just radiation so I'm not sure where to turn. I thought some advise might add some light!
Posts.Title: Decisions to be made.
